blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: How about Bakugo after his s/o has unexpectedly turned into a villian?
question: How about Bakugo after his s/o has unexpectedly turned into a villian?
answer:
-Bakugou would be mad, extremely so. He would probably explode everything in sight when he realizes his S/O is a villain.

-He would feel betrayed and would be overcome with sadness. After having his anger spurt, he would be pretty depressed and would tend to shut himself out and lash out at people trying to help him.

-He would want to be the one to bring you down and put you in jail. Since he probably knows the most about you, he deems himself the best to defeat you.

-He would still love you but, he would never act upon his love anymore. He would cast aside his feelings and work hard to defeat you.

-When he runs into you in a fight, he would yell and demand a reason for why you are a villain.

-He definitely would be less trusting and would probably overwork himself, and practically no longer sleep.

-If he had a bunch of pictures of you in his room, he would tear them all down immediately out of anger but, ends up keeping one picture of you because he can’t bring himself to hate you.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

summary: Everyone wants Bakugou’s hero name to be Ground Zero like on Horikoshi’s first draft of him, but listen. His hero name is going...
body:
Everyone wants Bakugou’s hero name to be Ground Zero like on Horikoshi’s first draft of him, but listen. His hero name is going to be Kacchan. It’s perfect. It parallel’s Midoriya’s hero name, for starters. The biggest argument people make against it is that, unlike Deku, Kacchan doesn’t have a meaning beyond shortening his given name. But it doesn’t need a meaning, because it has something else. Something Bakugou’s hero persona sorely needs. A function. Unlike Ground Zero or King Explosion Murder, the name Kacchan makes Bakugou approachable. You can be Mr. Scary, Angry Explodo-Kill all you want, but when your name has “chan” in it, you’re covering all that edge in something soft. Something that’ll endear civilians to you. Lacking that soft touch was the thing that made Bakugou fail the provisional license exam. If that could be remedied with something as simple as a name, well, I think Bakugou would take that before altering his style too much. 

And that at least answers half the question of “Why would Bakugou ever choose Kacchan as his hero name?” The other half of the answer remains to be seen, but mark my words. It’ll be because, to further the Deku-name parallel, it’ll be Uraraka who inspires the choice.

Everyone wants Bakugou’s hero name to be Ground Zero like on Horikoshi’s first draft of him, but listen. His hero name is going to be Kacchan. It’s perfect. It parallel’s Midoriya’s hero name, for starters. The biggest argument people make against it is that, unlike Deku, Kacchan doesn’t have a meaning beyond shortening his given name. But it doesn’t need a meaning, because it has something else. Something Bakugou’s hero persona sorely needs. A function. Unlike Ground Zero or King Explosion Murder, the name Kacchan makes Bakugou approachable. You can be Mr. Scary, Angry Explodo-Kill all you want, but when your name has “chan” in it, you’re covering all that edge in something soft. Something that’ll endear civilians to you. Lacking that soft touch was the thing that made Bakugou fail the provisional license exam. blog.name: ao3feed-shigadabi
blog.title: AO3 feed for Shigaraki Tomura x Dabi
blog.description: Using an IFTTT server to post the feed here.

title: 'Til the Pain Went Away
body:
by FFF- After Dark (FauxFoeFanworks)

Touya’s never been alone, and maybe he does it just because some part of him wants that familiar presence of another.
Tenko has always been alone, or rather, he at least felt like it. He has the childish yearning for love and care, but he doesn’t know what it truly is to ask for it.
When these boys find each other, they accidentally fill the gaps in their lives that they didn’t even know they had.

Or:
What may have happened if Tenko wasn’t found by All For One at such a young age, and a certain runaway redhead happens to wander into the right alley before any full-blow villains can.

Words: 3000, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dabi (My Hero Academia), Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Todoroki Touya
  • Relationships: Dabi/Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko, Shigaraki Tomura | Shimura Tenko/Todoroki Touya
  • Additional Tags: Dabi is Todoroki Touya, Touya tries to be a good big brother, Shigaraki is addressed as Tenko before he meets All For One, Tenko is just a scared kid, I make up their backstories, Child Abuse, Sexual Abuse, Not yet but it’ll be brought up as it goes on, Angst and Fluff and Smut, Eventual smut anyhow, Tags and ratings may change as this goes on, Alternate Universe, I like to call this the, Runaways AU, but that name is pending


source http://archiveofourown.org/works/17835509

blog.name: bnha-logged
blog.title: Plus Ultra!
blog.description: A roleplaying group for Boku No Hero Academia based out of Tumblr! You can apply by clicking Here!

summary:
Please welcome the villain, Hatsune Inari (Alias: Majo)! Quirk: 

"Trickster" - if any sort of Hatsune's flames, whether it be...
caption:
Please welcome the villain, Hatsune Inari (Alias: Majo)!

Quirk:  “Trickster” - if any sort of Hatsune’s flames, whether it be her own fires, candles she set up or sparks from a lighter or smoke, make contact with a person, she has the ability to put that person under an illusion and change their perception of reality for 30 - 40 minutes.

Personality: A silver tongued and intelligent woman with high ambitions and dramatic flare. An ex circus performer, she is theatrical with most of what she does, taking any opportunity to put on a show of any sort. Can be highly manipulative, both by nature and by her job’s requirement. Loves to gamble and drink. It’s her way, or the highway.

Background:  Hatsune comes from a very, VERY old fashioned family, more like a clan, living in almost complete isolation in the mountains. All are proud psychic quirk users and take their family line seriously, each round of children specifically bred through arranged marriages and such to have children with quirks to their liking. Hatsune was the best of her group, and thus was the trophy child. However, aside from that, she was entirely ignored, all cold towards her (there wasnt that much warmth in her family) aside from one of her younger cousins. Fed up with being an object of sorts, she fled her family at 14 and tried to start her life a-new. From traveling with a circus, to becoming the head of negotiations and relations in Shie Hassaki, she has never stopped moving around.

Follow her at: https://villianlog-majo.tumblr.com/

Art by @tomuraas

Loves to gamble and drink. It’s her way, or the highway.

Background:  Hatsune comes from a very, VERY old fashioned family, more like a clan, living in almost complete isolation in the mountains. All are proud psychic quirk users and take their family line seriously, each round of children specifically bred through arranged marriages and such to have children with quirks to their liking. Hatsune was the best of her group, and thus was the trophy child. However, aside from that, she was entirely ignored, all cold towards her (there wasnt that much warmth in her family) aside from one of her younger cousins. Fed up with being an object of sorts, she fled her family at 14 and tried to start her life a-new. From traveling with a circus, to becoming the head of negotiations and relations in Shie Hassaki, she has never stopped moving around.

Follow her at: https://villianlog-majo.tumblr.com/

Art by @tomuraas

trail.content_raw:
Please welcome the villain, Hatsune Inari (Alias: Majo)!

Quirk:  “Trickster” - if any sort of Hatsune’s flames, whether it be her own fires, candles she set up or sparks from a lighter or smoke, make contact with a person, she has the ability to put that person under an illusion and change their perception of reality for 30 - 40 minutes.

Personality: A silver tongued and intelligent woman with high ambitions and dramatic flare. An ex circus performer, she is theatrical with most of what she does, taking any opportunity to put on a show of any sort. Can be highly manipulative, both by nature and by her job’s requirement. Loves to gamble and drink. It’s her way, or the highway.

Background:  Hatsune comes from a very, VERY old fashioned family, more like a clan, living in almost complete isolation in the mountains. All are proud psychic quirk users and take their family line seriously, each round of children specifically bred through arranged marriages and such to have children with quirks to their liking. Hatsune was the best of her group, and thus was the trophy child. However, aside from that, she was entirely ignored, all cold towards her (there wasnt that much warmth in her family) aside from one of her younger cousins. Fed up with being an object of sorts, she fled her family at 14 and tried to start her life a-new. From traveling with a circus, to becoming the head of negotiations and relations in Shie Hassaki, she has never stopped moving around.

Follow her at: https://villianlog-majo.tumblr.com/

Art by @tomuraas

Loves to gamble and drink. It’s her way, or the highway.

body:
kaminari, running out of the bathroom with his pants half off:

EEEEEEYYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAKK

*the rest of the bakusquad runs in*

kirishima: WHAT HAPPENED? WHY ARE YOU SCREAMING?

bakugou: pull your fucking pants up.

sero: ARE YOU OKAY?

mina: I HAVE ALL MIGHT ON SPEED-DIAL.

kaminari, in tears: th-the toilet water kissed m-my ass.

[theres silence for like… two seconds*

sero: *faints*

mina and kirishima: *scrunch their faces in disgust*

bakugou: *scream-laughing* Y-*WHEEZE*YOU IDIOT OH MY FUCKING-*WHEEZE* I CAN’T FUCKING BR-*WHEEZE*EATHE.
